amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that Romania should be considered eligible for assistance under the provisions of the NATO Participation Act of 1994.
amendment.purpose: An amendment expressing the sense of Congress that Romania should be considered eligible for assistance under the provisions of the Nato Participation Act of 1984.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fox amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Mr. Serrano demanded a separate vote on the Fox amendment (A047).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fox amendment (A047) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 10 (Roll no. 198).
